questions.question_text:
An administrator has created a flow that sends platform events whenever an opportunity is updated. An Apex developer has been tasked to write code that listens for these events. When reviewing the debug logs for a user, the developer can see that the flow ran, but the debug information is missing.

What should the administrator recommend to assist with debugging?

choices.D: Set a debug log on the Automated Process entity.
choices.B: Select the Debug Enabled checkbox on platform events.
choices.C: Platform events are unavailable for debugging.
choices.A: Search the AppExchange to find a tool that assists with debugging.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D: To collect logs for an event subscription, add a trace flag entry for the Automated Process entity in Setup https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.platform_events.meta/platform_events/platform_events_subscribe_debug_autoproc.htm

Debug logs for platform events must be enabled for a user to see the debug information in their logs. To enable this feature, the Debug Enabled checkbox must be selected on the platform event.

Option A is not necessary as Salesforce provides a native debugging tool. Option C is not accurate because platform events can be used for debugging. Option D is incorrect as Automated Process entity is not used for platform events.

questions.question_text:
AW Computing continues to grow and has concerns about the volume of sensitive data being stored in its org. The administrator suggests utilizing Salesforce Shield.

What should the team consider before implementing Salesforce Shield?

choices.C: Shield Platform Encryption can be used with custom metadata types.
choices.D: Encrypted fields are unable to be referenced in flows.
choices.B: Einstein Lead Scoring is available on encrypted fields.
choices.A: Paused flows can cause data to be saved in an unencrypted state.

discussion.content:
Before implementing Salesforce Shield, the team should consider the following:

A. Paused flows can cause data to be saved in an unencrypted state.

The team should be aware that if a flow is paused while it is processing encrypted data, the data can be saved in an unencrypted state.

Selected Answer: B
The administrator can create a single dashboard that displays the same set of reports (opportunities and activities) but filter the data dynamically based on the top five clients.
This means that the same reports can show information for different clients depending on the selected filter, avoiding the need to create separate dashboards for each client.
A Over here we need to first create a custom report and then with that custom report we need to create a dashboard.

The dashboard feature that the administrator should use to meet the requirement of creating an account management dashboard displaying opportunities and activities for each of the top five clients is:

D. Matrix reports on a dashboard: Matrix reports are ideal for comparing related data, such as opportunities and activities for top clients. By creating a matrix report on opportunities and activities with the necessary fields and grouping by the account name, the administrator can display the data in a meaningful way on the dashboard.

The administrator can add the matrix report to the dashboard and customize the display using dashboard components. For example, the administrator can use the table component to display the data in a table format, or use the chart component to display the data in a visual format.

Selected Answer: C
Dynamic is used when content changes from user to user. Filter can be used if we need to see one account at time. As I understand we want all 5 accounts, so it is Joined report.
C...? The requirement is to show activities in conjunction to account. Unless you create custom report type, you need joined report?

This answer is wrong... its def not dynamic dashboards. Dashboards can be run as the logged-in user and show data the user has access to. This is called a ‘dynamic dashboard’ because the data displayed will depend on the user. The correct answer is joined reports... watch this video for more details.

questions.question_text:
The administrator at Universal Containers has been asked to create an account management dashboard displaying opportunities and activities for each of its top five clients.
Which dashboard feature should the Administrator use to meet this requirement?

choices.B: Use the credit card number mask type.
choices.A: Create a validation rule to ensure the length.
choices.D: Enter the number of digits at the field level.
choices.C: Define the number of mask characters.

questions.question_text: How should an administrator ensure the appropriate number of digits are entered into the custom encrypted field created to capture credit card numbers on the Opportunity object?

discussion.content: Option A: Creating a validation rule to ensure the length of the field value is a valid approach to ensure the appropriate number of digits are entered into the custom encrypted field created to capture credit card numbers on the Opportunity object.

choices.A: The quote has a validation rule preventing it from being updated.
choices.D: Another quote is already synced with the opportunity and is awaiting approval.
choices.B: The quote has already passed its expiration date.
choices.C: Another quote is already synced with the opportunity.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Tested and confirmed, validation rule is the only stopper.

Selected Answer: D
https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.quotes_sync_troubleshooting.htm&type=5

Answer is D, I think. It doesn't stop the process if a quote is already sync'ed as per this:
https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.quotes_synch.htm&type=5

The circumstance in which you would be prevented from sync'ing is if it's going through an approval process.

C. Another quote is already synced with the opportunity would prevent a user from syncing a quote with an opportunity. Salesforce only allows one quote to be synced with an opportunity at a time. If there is already a synced quote, the user will need to unsync it before syncing a new quote.
